author: peyton_shupe
content: Hi guys, do you know  any websites where I can read daily news happening in the web3 world?

author: abcoathup
content:
This Discord is for Ethereum R&D discussion.  You can follow along with R&D discussions here.
For the EF you can check their blog: https://blog.ethereum.org/
Otherwise check Twitter & Reddit (including following core devs & researchers from here).
